short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Twitter experience by directly rendering Instagram images into your feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitagram simplifies your daily Twitter usage by automatically fetching images from Instagram into your feed.  Videos are not supported at the moment.
